briefdescription.para: function setter of the valve values from a general state CSV file.

simplesect.para: 0 if the valves are set successfully

briefdescription.para: function getter of the initial valve values from the valve physical config CSV file.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errGetValveInitValue when the getter of the initial values fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function getter of the valve value from a general state CSV file on Windows or directly from the gpio line value on Linux.

parameterdescription.para: the line in a general state CSV file

briefdescription.para: function to reset the timers after the activation of all the valves.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Module to control the valves of the CAC Board.

detaileddescription.para:
Mael Parot
1.1
11/04/2024
Contains all functions related to controling valves with the gpiod library.
